feed.title: autobrr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.60.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • ef7317dde6575f1b407e49011b6fbbe40121eaad: feat(filters): show current download count in list (#2001) (@zze0s)
  • 570c7971a4dc684e06fbdec81bcb55a4e9e025e7: feat(indexers): add DarkPeers (#1989) (@zze0s)
  • c85fa3f31a2ad38dc978404e5c1f06ee6c710f67: feat(indexers): add PhoenixProject (#1996) (@zze0s)
  • 3f04b9c5b3ba2ad16227fd765e93ee302fa44e69: feat(indexers): add RocketHD (#1998) (@zze0s)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.59.0...v1.60.0

Docker images

  • docker pull ghcr.io/autobrr/autobrr:v1.60.0

What to do next?

  • Read the documentation
  • Join our Discord server

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.61.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • a8c4114d6d2d65d142b4e2b24c22fae7f2934732: feat(lists): read Plaintext from file on disk (#2031) (@zze0s)
  • 1c23b5df5780f4e02f35c2ee7d974a0b8890175f: feat(oidc): show profile pic if present (#2006) (@s0up4200)

Bug fixes

  • 6b2b1637cb1e7b61ed0ef85936edfb5184fe67a7: fix(irc): set proxy if use proxy is enabled (#2011) (@zze0s)
  • 48870044a2433792fc5b5a7fedd57f3c53f3e6ab: fix(oidc): fetch claims from Userinfo endpoint (#2028) (@s0up4200)

Other work

  • e137ac4070cd3adb542a34ef1cc1256b3cba4e6c: build(ci): setup goreleaser-pro (#2020) (@zze0s)
  • b309df87b5c74bc1ed951d04c2d3a4e6192b7305: build(deps): bump the golang group across 1 directory with 14 updates (#2024) (@dependabot[bot])
  • 40aa3b404bcad804dc566605ebb0ae938058f45e: build(deps): bump the npm group across 1 directory with 23 updates (#2025) (@dependabot[bot])
  • f1fd08a2eb8197df05db4a0414b9a7bc09e3ddc6: chore(indexers): remove lusthive (#2007) (@martylukyy)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.60.0...v1.61.0

Docker images

  • docker pull ghcr.io/autobrr/autobrr:v1.61.0

What to do next?

  • Read the documentation
  • Join our Discord server

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.62.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • fe4f385a2263d4b5ad2c0a0c60cfd65108b8c1e2: feat(database): connect postgres via socket and read config from env _FILE secrets (#2061) (@zze0s)
  • b980b5530df10ee5566bcce320ee1f49388067d3: feat(filters): add DSD formats to music (#1993) (@fabricionaweb)
  • 936fbe3cecbe6e00e8b1ef7f3be61fbb466c3372: feat(filters): show disabled indexer warning (#2034) (@s0up4200)
  • 5da0ebbe1f2a599f63366d23bb8e1751a2827aa3: feat(indexers): add HomieHelpDesk (#2050) (@zze0s)
  • 6073480bc42bf77383638507c647cd66d9abc606: feat(indexers): add T66y (#2044) (@nitrix)
  • ac30f2b0a720e0459f28e5346b01011e31fad00c: feat(indexers): add XtremeWrestlingTorrents (#2051) (@zze0s)
  • c7efcf1b753b67ff290ef23c406a165c904080b4: feat(macros): implement template cache (#2049) (@s0up4200)
  • 24648e45f76e98490f27f8d45f367b63417c1073: feat(web): persist releases incognito state (#2042) (@s0up4200)

Bug fixes

  • a0dfe890321b9be5e0723ebacc95c79108828cd2: fix(filters): multi-single value dynamic range matching (#2033) (@zze0s)
  • 0c71f3a3d27be6c5e1b5ef6ce2b0a8d01c433091: fix(http): change onboarding unavailable log level (#2048) (@martylukyy)
  • 7c5f5ac9fdb85ec1e7a18d91e61f13af1713bd60: fix(macros): set HasLog when Log Score is missing in announce (#2052) (@nuxencs)
  • 71818093dabc915205aec5d25686d2790888286f: fix(metrics): irc channel enabled gauge (#2039) (@Intuinewin)

Other work

  • 1ae8624e0564c0acf02e3f45bd13a8c98b750299: build(deps): bump Go to 1.24 (#2060) (@zze0s)
  • fb7962cb018e6d0000fc9594e3b35b9025caddfd: build(deps): bump the golang group with 10 updates (#2059) (@dependabot[bot])
  • ce4170e5eed331342d6735696c9575f9a7a95a5f: build(deps): bump the npm group in /web with 19 updates (#2058) (@dependabot[bot])
  • bfda849ef56be9bf797dd48edcc8e78ad349bf7d: chore(indexers): remove TorrentSeeds (#2040) (@s0up4200)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.61.0...v1.62.0

Docker images

  • docker pull ghcr.io/autobrr/autobrr:v1.62.0

What to do next?

  • Read the documentation
  • Join our Discord server

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.63.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • 92ddb919a5591eff752baa92531a582cffc3b5c8: feat(autobrrctl): add filters export functionality (#2065) (@luckylittle)
  • 46f6fbe5cc4d95b8d299eb4bbc222c3e12a2e566: feat(feeds): optimize existing cache items check (#2078) (@zze0s)
  • 58c9b06c84e9ee37525c1e08ea1447dc5e02419e: feat(indexers): CapybaraBR parse freeleech and internal (#2077) (@a1Thiago)
  • 4067940cbd67a0bdae26330974243e22c063cb31: feat(indexers): DigitalCore include size (#2094) (@zze0s)
  • a8b4ca69a243f96ae065bb4367bef04392ed89f3: feat(indexers): new IRC auth mechanism for RocketHD (#2085) (@martylukyy)
  • 4ce224199134e643108dd315e5d801f492734f6c: feat(lists): add option to skip cleaning of Plaintext data (#2036) (@luckylittle)

Bug fixes

  • f5e484679b996f698e43661bd686858a001c29b1: fix(ci): trigger docs update via workflow_run (#2066) (@s0up4200)
  • 8b41c8d5954e06a02e2a08cc77d63c3455da75fc: fix(indexers): XWT update download url with passkey (#2081) (@zze0s)
  • 14b4d859150223bec50451c001032e4a09f9e6f2: fix(web): ensure release table auto-update (#2068) (@s0up4200)

Other work

  • 6e57b41529a7062f406fffb74ec2eb666bedce56: build(deps): bump the golang group with 9 updates (#2083) (@dependabot[bot])
  • 4d04a7978256421f3d8b3e8ddf92dddeb9557031: build(deps): bump the npm group in /web with 16 updates (#2084) (@dependabot[bot])
  • 9caf7807de9ef152c845386f6a91246b959cca96: build: goreleaser snapshot during pr builds (#2082) (@zze0s)
  • 38b09ea4d5af1702e6426290150c21e8803d4bf6: docs(installers): move Whatbox to one-click Installer section (#2091) (@chancemon)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.62.0...v1.63.0

Docker images

  • docker pull ghcr.io/autobrr/autobrr:v1.63.0

What to do next?

  • Read the documentation
  • Join our Discord server
